review_data.title: Splendid fondue experience

review_data.title: Käsefondue wie es sein muss

review_data.title: Best fondue in Zurich
review_data.content: No doubt in my mind. Best fondue in Zurich but don't go there for anything else. Good wine. Charming manageress. Not in centre but worth the tram ride from central town.

review_data.title: Great Fondue
review_data.content: Excellent tasting fondue although it always goes so quickly. Service is very friendly. Small but warm and friendly place. Tap water is complimentary (I think I saw another person said that they charge by the glass - we did not get this).

review_data.title: Delicious Fondue
review_data.content: As everyone has said, this is delicious fondue. The restaurant is very friendly and appeared to be mostly a local crowd. The fondue came with bread and potatoes (as opposed to just bread) which was not true at some other restaurants. Definitely a bonus!

review_data.title: First real fondue!
review_data.content: Delicious fondue! The service was great! We had a brandy infused fondue with potatoes and bread, wine, and dessert. The desserts with liquour are STRONG! Very good but strong.

review_data.title: If you like cheese fondue, then you love this restaurant.
review_data.content: In a cozy original Swiss atmosphere friendly a friendly waitress will serve you the most Swiss of the Swiss delights: a cheese fondue. You have a choice of pure Vacherin cheese for connaisseurs or moité-moité which is half Vacherin half special cheese mix. I recomment...More

review_data.title: Good Fondue. 11 CHF for water
review_data.content: We had fondue at two places in Zurich, and this was definitely the winner. Our meal was tasty and service was good. The place was extremely warm inside, we had to ask the waitress to open the window. I would warn against ordering tap water...More

review_data.title: The real thing
review_data.content: A small restaurant that specializes almost exclusively in fondues. The food is good but the service is somewhat erratic. Overall worth a visit if you want to taste the real thing - but not anything else.

review_data.title: wenig, teuer ...und schweizerisch unfreundlich!

review_data.title: Great fondue but insufficient quantity

review_data.title: A classic!

The welcoming was well, my wish (non-alcoholic fondue) was received understandably and...More

review_data.title: Delicious Fonude
review_data.content: It smells like fondue and tastes delicious. Good value, good fondue. Mix of tourists and locals. Easy to find.

review_data.title: Great food, but BYO WATER! (11 CHF! for water!)

review_data.title: Excellent Fondue - perfect service

review_data.title: Best cheese fondue I've had in Zurich
review_data.content: I've tried a couple of places so far in Zurich for a cheese fondue. Have to say this is my favorite. Its a small place a bit hidden in a dark street, so be sure to have a map on your phone to guide you...More

review_data.title: Best fondue in years, and a great kirsch list
review_data.content: After our international flight out of Zurich was cancelled, we decided to keep the mood up with a good fondue and hopped on the train and the tram to go to the Fonduestuebli, only three tram stops on Tram 3 from the main station. The...More

review_data.title: Cheese Fondue as it should be
review_data.content: The atmosphere is exactly what you would expect of cheese fondue restaurant, red-checkered tablecloths and all. The cheese fondue is very good but I recommend ordering the either the pickles or the fruit as the cheese and bread can become monotonous after a while.

review_data.title: Fondue away from the crush

review_data.title: Great fondue
review_data.content: Traditional restaurant with fondue-only menu. Old-style decor, but great fondue and nice staff. It's quite busy, I would recommend to book a table in advance.

review_data.title: Das Zürcher Fondue-Restaurant!

review_data.title: Great, tasty, and very Swiss!
review_data.content: An excellent fondue restaurant that is reasonably priced (for Zürich) and easy to get to from the center of town. It's located in a cute neighborhood and the staff is friendly. The fondue is great (luckily, as it's basically all they do) and they have...More

review_data.title: Two kinds of fondue as main course!
review_data.content: Fascinating restaurant serving a few starters, two kinds of fondue (including moitié-moitié) and several desserts. Guests know that the fondue is "the best" in Zurich. Quick service, even when all tables were occupied.

review_data.title: Good Fondue

review_data.title: The best fondue in Zurich!

review_data.content: If you are looking for great cheese fondue (they do not make meat or chocolate fondues) then this is the place. The cheese is a perfect blend of I think she said 5 different cheeses of different ages. You must tru it.

review_data.title: Best fondue in Zürich

The restaurant is traditionally decorated and always full (so better show up with a reservation). The fondue is excellent, however the service is not always constant: sometimes...More

review_data.title: Very good traditional fondue restaurant

review_data.title: My Greek colleague liked it as well !
